title: Synthwave Retro 18 tracks Pack "Remodelling Evolution"
description: 18 Original Electronic music tracks inspired by the Synth sounds of the 80’s infused with Modern Electronic, World Percussion, Orchestral Choirs, Norse chanting, distorted Rock Guitars and more.
longDescription:
Listen HERE on Soundcloud


"Remodelling Evolution" Album by Eons After. 18 Original Electronic music tracks inspired by the Synth sounds of the 80’s infused with Modern Electronic, World Percussion, Orchestral Choirs, Norse chanting, distorted Rock Guitars and more.


This style would fit into your futuristic, neon metropolis, synthetic, robotic, cyber, cyborg, apocalyptic, dystopian settings, soundtracks, Video Games, scenes, etc, with atmospheres and feelings of general dark, sometimes chaotic, machine or electronic orientated control or resistance.


Each song consists of the original audio track and additionally, all the sections broken down in 2,4,6, 8 or 16 bar loops (etc), individualised to give multiple options and so they can be looped seamlessly as required. A grand total of 310 Loops!!!


There are also 2 tracks as an extra Bonus to this album that are have the original and a single looped track with all the sections ready for editing if required.


This Pack contains 18 ORIGINAL tracks: (63 Mins)


1. Beyond the Pale (4 Mins)

2. Petrichor's Warning (5:37)

3. Love Punch (3:05)

4. Too Cliché to be Cliché (3:07)

7. Neon Squint (4:49)

8. The Cybertribe (2:48)

9. Proportionality Bias (3:08)

10. Morale Fire Sale (3:23)

11. Not Cliché Enough (2:13)

12. Subduing the Sings (3:26)

13. Satellite Flare Burn (4:16)

14. Chaotically Beautiful (3:43)

16. Relying on Subterfuge (2:43)

18. Evolution Impasse (4:13") "Bonus track 2"

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 328

Number of Audio Cues: 328

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 164 Mins (Almost 3 hours!!!)

Supported Development Platforms:

Just .WAV files so goes with everything

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
